title: Which college is better, PGDAV or Satyawati in DU? - Quora
tags: Pannalal Girdharlal Dayanand Anglo Vedic, University of Delhi

response.answer_text: Both the colleges are somewhat of the same standards. I’ll suggest you to consider proximity as the main channel for choosing between the two. In terms of facilities both the colleges are at par though PGDAV enjoys a better theatre culture. Also PGDAV has a location advantage being in Lajpat Nagar and the overall crowd their too is better when compared to Satyavati College. But if you are into politics then I’ll like to tell you that it is one of the most politically active colleges in the whole Delhi University.
Satyawati has a better exposure as compared to PGDAV.
